__e: Hmm. The point is that if they knew that, uh, I was under your care for a problem that I have, that they would, you know, show me a little more, uh, kindness.
"If they knew it was me that took the money," "I wouldn't be here talking to you now."
No. I got sent here, I think because they knew it was the one place I didn't want to go.
I didn't want the kids to know what their mother was doing.
If your parents knew what you kids really do here... and you're sure it was her?
Look, I've been in trouble with the law before, and if they knew what I did or who I was...
Is that I loved you enough to make sure everyone knew, Sean.
You know what I don't get is how they all knew exactly where we were that fast.
It's not something I ever intended to make public, but... I'm glad that I did.
"If anybody knows that, it's you." What is that?
And for what it's worth, I know you didn't want your friends to know how awful the date was.
If only your boys knew how much their daddy loved them.
Help me break this up. The others shouldn't hear this.
I just always thought that you ever talked about your family because you didn't want them knowing about me.
Oh. I wanted them to know about us and... they needed to know that I'm moving forward with my life.
